full_text:
AUTHORIZATION FOR USE, RELEASE, OR REQUEST OF YOUR HEALTH INFORMATION

Name (print):___________________________________________
DOB: _____________

Medical Rec# __________________

Address: ___________________________________________________________

Phone: _______________________________

I hereby authorize the release of medical records TO or FROM (please circle one):
_________________________________
Office or Name

________________________________________________
Mailing Address, including City, State and Zip code

_________________________________
Phone Number

________________________________________________
Fax Number

Georgia Retina Fax #:______________________________

Georgia Retina Phone # 1-888-427-3846

Please list the information you would like released:
__________________________________________________________________________________________________
 I understand that this information may include any history of acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (AIDS),
sexually transmitted diseases, human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection, behavioral health
service/psychiatric care, treatment for alcohol and/or drug abuse, or similar conditions.
The following information should not be released, even if occurring during the time frame referenced above:
__________________________________________________________________________________________________

Please list the reason for releasing this information:___________________________________________________
 I understand that this authorization is voluntary. If I do not sign this form, my healthcare from
Georgia Retina and the payment of this healthcare will not be affected; however, personal health information may
not be released to outside parties, other than for payment, treatment, or business operation.
 I understand that once my information is released, it may no longer be protected by federal privacy regulations.
 I understand that I may see and copy the information described on this form if I ask for it, and I will get a copy of this
form after I sign it.
 I understand that this authorization will expire: upon completion of this disclosure/use
 I understand that after I sign this form, I may change my mind and revoke this authorization at any time, except to
the extent that Georgia Retina has already acted based on the authorization. To revoke this authorization, please
notify the Privacy Officer of Georgia Retina in writing at 833 Campbell Hill St., Ste. 300 Marietta, GA 30060.
 I understand Georgia Retina may charge up to $25 for the reproduction of my medical records based on guidelines
from the state of Georgia and the federal government.
___________________________________________________________________
Signature of Patient or Patient’s Representative

__________________________
Date

Printed name of Patient’s Representative: _______________________________________________________________
Relationship to Patient: ______________________________________________________________________________
Updated 6/30/16
